name: OPEN SEA DEEP SPEAR FISHING DELUXE
name_original: OPEN SEA DEEP SPEAR FISHING DELUXE
description:
Go DEEP SPEAR FISHING like it was 1999!

Catch fish, train your freediving skills to hold breath for longer and venture deeper into the ocean.

Wrestle fish in one-on-one tug-of-war combat.

Made for LUDUM DARE #48 in collaboration with WhyNot.
